clusterStatistics.title: Cluster Statistics
clusterStatistics.description:
A text cluster represents a group of text blocks from student submissions that are identified to be similar.
Once there is tutor feedback on a text block, this feedback is propagated to all other text blocks in that cluster.
The following table shows an overview of all generated text clusters for this exercise.
You can see how many of the automatic feedback suggestions were reused within a cluster. You can also disable a cluster, for example, if a low usage rate of automatic feedback indicates that clustering has not resulted in reusable feedback being suggested during text exercise assessment.
clusterStatistics.reusedFeedbackRatio: Ratio of Reused Feedback in Cluster
clusterStatistics.reusedFeedbackRatioTooltip: Amount of reused automatic feedback / cluster size
clusterStatistics.noClustersFound: No text clusters found for this exercise
